name: Bombs Away (itch) (LittleGiantGameDev)
description:
A short game about racking up points by crapping on those below you. Thus is life.  Made for BirdJam 2022.

CONTROLS:

W or UP ARROW - flap your wings

S or DOWN ARROW - slow down

A/D or Left/Right ARROWS - turn

E or ALT - "exact your revenge"!

Hit different cars without missing to build up your multiplier!

TARGET SCORES:

Bronze Medal - 10,000

Silver Medal 20,000

Gold Medal 40,000

A game by Adam Beyer and Peter Havran.

THANKS FOR PLAYING!
